channel.title: Grand Exchange Price Getter v1.0
channel.description:
[url=http://"http://rapidshare.com/files/211947234/dist.rar"]http://rapidshare.com/files/211947234/dist.rar[/url]
Extract all files to a single folder, run GePGetter.jar.
It's a little buggy on the images, but that not my fault, music is read from online, so it takes a second to load ( And will sorta lag if you're internet is Al Gore). Other then that, It's an amazing program.
Use: [url=http://"http://www.itemdb.co.nr/"]http://www.itemdb.co.nr/[/url]
To grab the item ID.
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/9htovs.jpg[/img]
Forgot to trim the white stuff, oh well.
v1.1 Fixes Text moved over so more readable
v1.2 Ideas Button for 7 day graph Button for 30 day graph

item.title: Grand Exchange Price Getter v1.0

item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

in the time you have used to get the item number from http://www.itemdb.co.nr/, you could just check the price your self at http://itemdb-rs.runescape.com/frontpage.ws
